description: Acción Ecológica is a dedicated activist organization focused on defending the rights of nature and promoting food sovereignty in Ecuador. With nearly 40 years of experience, it engages in various initiatives, including urban agroecological gardens, monitoring GMOs, and training community members. By collaborating with local collectives and networks, Acción Ecológica aims to create sustainable urban spaces, enhance community interaction, and advocate for environmental justice, all while confronting extractivist policies that threaten ecosystems and livelihoods.
name: Acción Ecológica
